arts.ttl: "99.9%" - Slot gives Isak, Gravenberch injury updates before Liverpool vs. Villa
arts.sum: Liverpool head coach Arne Slot delivers the latest updates on Ryan Gravenberch, Alexander Isak and Curtis Jones ahead of Saturday's Premier League showdown at home to Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Slot '99.9% certain' Isak will miss Liverpool's clash with Aston Villa
arts.sum:
Alexander Isak and Curtis Jones are “99.9%” certain to miss Liverpool’s clash against Aston Villa, but Ryan Gravenberch is on course to return from injury.

Gravenberch twisted his ankle in the second half of the 2-1 loss at home to Manchester United earlier in the month and required lengthy treatment before making way for Curtis Jones just after the hour mark.

arts.ttl: Gravenberch to save Slot? Liverpool injury and suspension list vs. Aston Villa
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest on Ryan Gravenberch and Liverpool's other injury and suspension news before Aston Villa's Premier League trip to Anfield on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Aston Villa preview: Team news, line-ups, prediction
arts.sum: Aston Villa will be highly anticipating their trip to Anfield on Saturday, given Liverpool’s current Premier League form. Villa triumphed in a hard-fought 1-0 win... The post Liverpool vs Aston Villa preview: Team news, line-ups, prediction appeared first on Villa News.

arts.ttl: Harvey Elliott Liverpool contract clause 'revealed' ahead of Aston Villa game
arts.sum: Aston Villa reportedly have an option to sign Harvey Elliott permanently next summer, but there is also a possibility that he could return to Liverpool.
